PIN_I2C_SCL.help: Pin connected to I2C_SCL on the test shield.

PIN_I2C_SDA.help: Pin connected to I2C_SDA on the test shield.

PIN_I2C_EN.help: Pin connected to I2C_EN on the test shield.

PIN_I2C_EN_FMP.help: Pin connected to I2C_EN_FMP on the test shield.

PIN_SPI_SCLK.help: Pin connected to SPI_SCLK on the test shield.

PIN_SPI_MISO.help: Pin connected to SPI_MISO on the test shield.

PIN_SPI_MOSI.help: Pin connected to SPI_MOSI on the test shield.

PIN_SPI_CS.help: Pin connected to SPI_CS on the test shield.

PIN_PWM_OUT.help: Pin connected to PWM_OUT on the test shield.

PIN_DAC_OUT.help: Pin connected to DAC_OUT on the test shield.

PIN_ANALOG_IN.help: Pin connected to ANALOG_IN on the test shield.

PIN_BUSIN_2.help: Pin connected to BUSIN_2 on the test shield.

PIN_BUSOUT_2.help: Pin connected to BUSOUT_2 on the test shield.

PIN_BUSIN_1.help: Pin connected to BUSIN_1 on the test shield.

PIN_BUSOUT_1.help: Pin connected to BUSOUT_1 on the test shield.

PIN_BUSIN_0.help: Pin connected to BUSIN_0 on the test shield.

PIN_BUSOUT_0.help: Pin connected to BUSOUT_0 on the test shield.

TESTSHIELD_ENABLE_HW_SPI_CS.help: Set to 1 if PIN_SPI_CS is connected to a pin with hardware SPI support

TESTSHIELD_DEBUG_MESSAGES.help: Set to 1 to enable debug messages from the test shield tests
